016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.client.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.net.Sockets;
020import org.xbill.DNS.*;
021import org.xbill.DNS.hosts.HostsFileParser;
022import org.xbill.DNS.lookup.LookupSession;
023
024import java.util.ArrayList;
025import java.util.List;
026
027public class DnsLookupSessionFactory {
028    private final LookupSession lookupSession;
029
030    public DnsLookupSessionFactory(Configuration configuration) {
031
032        DnsClientConfiguration dnsClientConfiguration = new DnsClientConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("dns.client"));
033
034        Resolver resolver = dnsClientConfiguration.getNameServers()
035                .map(hosts ->
036                {
037                    if (hosts.isEmpty()) {
038                        return new ExtendedResolver();
039                    } else {
040                        List<Resolver> resolvers = new ArrayList<>();
041                        for (String nameserver : hosts) {
042                            resolvers.add(new SimpleResolver(Sockets.getInetSocketAddress(nameserver, 53)));
043                        }
044                        if (resolvers.size() == 1) {
045                            return resolvers.get(0);
046                        } else {
047                            return new ExtendedResolver(resolvers);
048                        }
049                    }
050                })
051                .orElseGet(ExtendedResolver::new);
052
053        resolver.setTimeout(dnsClientConfiguration.getTimeout());
054        resolver.setTCP(dnsClientConfiguration.getForceTCP());
055
056        lookupSession = LookupSession.builder()
057                .searchPath(dnsClientConfiguration.getSearchDomains())
058                .cache(new Cache())
059                .resolver(resolver)
060                .hostsFileParser(new HostsFileParser())
061                .build();
062    }
063
064    public LookupSession provide() {
065        return lookupSession;
066    }
067
068    public void dispose(LookupSession instance) {
069    }
070}
